name: Oh no!That shouldn't be there!
description:
You work at a supermarket and people just keep leaving things everywhere except where they should be. Go and make everything tidy by picking up the items and taking them to their respective shelves. Move with WASD, tilt the camera with Q and A, and just go over the items to pick them up and take them to the shelves. You can control the character with a gamepad, but it's pretty untested. In any case, the left stick moves the character and the shoulder buttons tilt the camera.

Made for the TOJam Gamejam 2022
